text: James or Jim Copeland may refer to: * James Copeland (outlaw) (1823–1857), American outlaw * James Copeland (actor) (1918–2002), Scottish actor * Jim Copeland (Canadian football) (born 1939), Canadian football player * Jim Copeland (American football) (1945–2010), American football player and college athletics administrator * Jim Copeland (cyclist) (born 1962), American cyclist
title: James Copeland
